title: The World According to Bertie
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: My Daddy's name is Stuart, and he works for the Scottish Executive, where he makes up numbers.

title: The World According to Bertie
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: Stuart Pollock, statistician in the Scottish Executive (with special responsibility for the adjustment of forecasts), husband of Irene Pollock, father of Bertie (6) and Ulysses (4 months); coproprietor

title: And the Land Lay Still
author: Robertson, James
snippet: There was a meeting of  the party's Scottish Executive.
